mapper.select: select a.*,b.subject_head_portrait_path as img,b.name as subjectName from t_gz_user_subject a,t_gz_subject b where a.user_id = #{id}
select a.expire_time,a.create_time,b.name as subjectName,b.subject_head_portrait_path as img from t_gz_user_subject a,t_gz_subject b where a.user_id = #{id} and a.expire_time < #{currentTimeMillis}
